CustomField.description: If selected, creates the Backlog dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This is used to create the Backlog and PSA Overview dashboards in the PS Cloud Advanced Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, creates the Backlog dataset in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app. This is used to create the Backlog and PSA Overview dashboards in the PS Cloud Advanced Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Backlog
